Please fill in your data before using the application.
Make sure your birth date and biological mother\'s name are filled in with the correct data because it is used as checking the similarity of data when forgetting your PIN.
*The password must be 8-20 characters long! Password is a combination of capital letters, lowercase letters and numbers.
Password must be consist of 8-20 characters!
Before using the application, please change your password for security reasons.
%1$s will send the Forgot Password procedure. Select the type of Forgot Password notification that you want to process.

You can get cash through an ATM machine or through an agent (Mesin EDC)
Pilih menu Pembayaran > menu Lainnya > menu Virtual Account

Pilih menu Transfer > Rekening CIMB Niaga/Rekening Ponsel Lain > Rekening CIMB Niaga Lain
Lakukan login dengan akun Mandiri Online
Pilih penyedia jasa Top Up Saldomu
Saldomu adalah aplikasi keuangan dengan fitur media sosial. Karena perbankan merupakan bagian dari kehidupan sosial anda.
SALDOMU is registered as MANUFACTURER OF FINANCIAL TECHNOLOGY at Bank Indonesia Number 20/85/DKSP/Srt/B dated March 8, 2018.
1. SALDOMU is only distributed through the Play Store and App Store by PT Mitra Pembayaran Elektronik.
2. Please DO NOT log in other media besides the official application to avoid any type of fraud in the name of SALDOMU.
3. If there are indications of fraud, please report to us via support@saldomu.com

PT. MITRA PEMBAYARAN ELEKTRONIK 
 Kantor Pusat :
 Ruko Villa Bukit Mas RE No. 7 
 Surabaya - 60225
Please choose a customer service based on the provider that you use to get the best service.

Nomor akun yang dimasukkan tidak sesuai dengan data akun, tolong masukkan nomor akun yang benar
Tanggal lahir tidak boleh melebihi tanggal hari ini
Tanggal datang kembali tidak boleh kurang tanggal hari ini
* Make sure that the date of birth that you choose is in accordance with what is stated on your ID Card.
* Make sure that the email address listed is correct and active, because all your Saldomu transaction reports will be sent to that email address.
*Pastikan bahwa No. Rekening yang Anda masukkan sudah benar.
*Pastikan bahwa Nama Penerima yang Anda masukkan sudah benar.

Penerima gagal dan tidak bisa menerima transfer saldo dikarenakan suatu hal (limit saldo penerima telah maksimum, penerima dorman,suspend, atau tidak aktif).
Penerima belum terdaftar sebagai member. Jumlah saldo akan diterima ketika penerima telah mendaftar sebagai member.
Nomor %1$s belum punya %2$s. Tekan \'Ya\' bila ingin mengajak untuk bergabung %2$s. Ajakan akan kadaluarsa dalam %3$s jam. Saldo akan terkirim saat temanmu bergabung.
